title: Laboratory Equipment | Laboratory Equipment Suppliers
text: Featured REVIEWS Best Sellers New Arrivals - - - - Pro Scientific PRO400DSEL Digital Benchtop Homogenizer, 10ml-30L Volume Pro ScientificPROSCI-PRO400DSEL$9,441.00 - $12,675.00 - Pro Scientific PRO400DS Digital Benchtop Homogenizer, 10ml-30L Volume Pro ScientificPROSCI-PRO400DS$8,298.00 - $11,532.00 ABOUT US In 2010, we started as a small family-owned business specializing in renewed lab equipment. With just one rack in a hallway, our passion for helping people drove us forward. With 5 employees, we moved into a 12,000 square-foot facility just 1 year later. As we grew, our commitment to providing affordable prices and exceptional service remained at the core of our business. In 2016, we expanded our offerings and adopted the name USA Lab, solidifying our dedication to delivering high-quality lab equipment to laboratories nationwide. Our relentless pursuit of customer satisfaction led to further growth, and in 2022, with 18 employees we moved to a 30,000 square-foot facility to better serve our expanding customer base.
